name: BLOODSHOT
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam (2017)
In BLOODSHOT, your blood is your life, and your ammo. In the Dungeon of Eyes, creatures are out for a taste of your blood. Show them who's boss by reaching the bottom floor and becoming the Blood King.
Features two game modes: Dungeon and Arena (endless mode).

Controls: WASD, Mouse.

Tips:
-Holding the left mouse button restores blood, but restricts movement. Make sure you're out of harm's way before regenerating.

-You can sneak up on enemies with closed eyes. Just don't move too fast near them or they'll spot you.

-Moving diagonally is a surefire way to stay hidden. Master the "snake sneak" technique, and you can sneak up on any foe.
